page.title: 11A CROSS BOY'S WEEKDAY
page.content: Maxwell gets up at{7.30am.}He{washes, has{breakfast}& then{goes outside}to play on his{bike.}Before{cycling to {school}he feeds his pet{sticklebacks. School{starts}at 9am &{ends}at 4pm. He does{Maths, English, Reading, Art, {Music, Gym, Technical & Project work, but he likes{Gym}best. At{playtime}he plays{football. Dinner}is from{12.45- {1.35pm}- his favourite is{fish & chips (with salt & vinegar) followed by {lemon meringue pie.}After school,he {cycles home, changes}& does his{fiddle {practice}until{tea time.}He then{plays {with the dog}or goes to his{friend's to play{football}or goes down to the {beach.}When he gets{home}he has something to{eat}&{watches TV}until bedtime. He goes to{bed}at{9.30pm}& {reads a book}until he falls asleep.
